ygData.msgSnippet: Date: Fri, 17 May 2002 22:56:24 -0000 From: bigmaca3  Subject: Week of War Has anyone seen or heard of any events going on for this?  I
ygData.messageBody:
Date: Fri, 17 May 2002 22:56:24 -0000
From: "bigmaca3" <bigmaca3@...>
Subject: Week of War

Has anyone seen or heard of any events going on for this? I remember
around the time Stormhammer was opened they had a week of adventure.
I could get into a war!

Tuldayen Grimblade
36th season Ranger of Tunare
Terris-Thule


I've seen a few messages but no events yet. Last GM event I got to participate in was at Halloween. Got a million bone chips from Qeynos Hills but some idiot kept killing the named and stopping the event. Everyone wanted to kill that guy but he wouldn't accept the duels.

Bebinn
37 Ranger
Bristlebane server
